The image of the: Tiny Toker" toyset was found to be fake and was created by photoshopping a stock photograph of a boy blowing bubbles to make it appear as if he was holding a toy bong.
The claim that the: Tiny Toker" toyset was sold at "Worst Buy" instead of "Best Buy" provided an obvious hint that it was a joke, but some individuals still presented it as a real toy set on social media.
The expert mentions a previous hoax in 2: Happy Hour Playset," indicating a pattern of fabricated stoner-themed products being circulated online.
